segments.text: Good evening , madam . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a facial . But this is the first time I've come here , so can you tell me how you do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Most facials start with a thorough cleaning . Then we usually use a toner to invigorate the skin , followed by exfoliation treatment-a peeling mask or scrub that removes the dead cells that make the skin lock dull . After that , we'll massage your face and neck with oil or cream to improve the circulation and relieve the tension , followed by a mask to moisturize and soften the skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly what I want . How long does it take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have half-hour and one-hour treatments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the half-hour facial costs 50 yuan and the one-hour costs 80 yuan . If you want make-up , another 20 yuan will do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , I will take the one hour facial with make-up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , could you give me a manicure ? Use a light nail-polish , please .
segments.speaker: S2
